label: Protection of Women from Domestic Violence Act (PWDVA)

domestic_relationship.description: Whether a domestic relationship exists or has existed between the aggrieved person and the respondent.

respondent_identity.description: The person against whom the relief is sought (adult male or family member).

domestic_violence_occurrence.description: Whether the domestic violence (as defined in the Act) has occurred.

nature_of_domestic_violence.description: Specific type of violence (e.g., 'physical abuse', 'emotional abuse', 'economic abuse').

relief_sought.description: The specific relief sought (e.g., 'protection order', 'residence order', 'monetary relief').

shared_household.description: Whether the parties have lived together in a shared household.

type_of_petition.description: The section under which the application is filed (e.g., 'Sec 12 application').

case_title.description: The full case title with parties (e.g., 'A.K. Goel vs. State of Delhi').

court_name.description: The name of the court that delivered the judgment (e.g., 'High Court of Delhi').

judgment_date.description: The date the judgment was delivered (e.g., '15th March, 2012').

appellant_or_petitioner.description: The name(s) of the appellant or petitioner.

judges_coram.description: The name(s) of the judge(s) who delivered the judgment.

sections_invoked.description: List of legal sections invoked in the case.

case_type.description: The type of case (e.g., 'Criminal Appeal', 'Writ Petition').

acts_and_sections.description: Acts and sections involved in the case.
